v1.0.0 (Mon Aug 10 2020)

  • feat: added AVIF encoder, updated packages to support alpha channels #212 (@saschazar21)

  • chore: updated emscripten emsdk (@saschazar21)
  • feat(avif): replaced dav1d with aom, added encoding functionality (@saschazar21)

🚀 Enhancement

  • feat(avif): updated build script to compile rav1e encoder (@saschazar21)

🐛 Bug Fix

  • chore: fixed merge conflicts in yarn.lock (@saschazar21)
  • chore(avif): bumped libavif version (@saschazar21)
  • chore(avif): updated README (@saschazar21)
  • fix(avif): fixed RGBA decoding (@saschazar21)
  • test(avif): updated AVIF tests (@saschazar21)
  • test: removed 4-channel PNG tests due to instability (@saschazar21)
  • test(avif): removed write file call (@saschazar21)
  • fix(avif): fixed rav1e flags for libavif (@saschazar21)
  • fix(avif): fixed rav1e include dir (@saschazar21)
  • fix(avif): fixed rav1e paths, uncommented encode function (@saschazar21)
  • fix(avif): fixed emscripten toolchain in build file (@saschazar21)

🔩 Dependency Updates

  • chore(deps-dev): bump eslint-plugin-jest from 23.17.1 to 23.18.0 #162 (@dependabot-preview[bot])
  • chore(deps-dev): bump @babel/preset-env from 7.10.2 to 7.10.4 #156 (@dependabot-preview[bot])
